title: We have disabled Teemo due to in game issues, and are currently working on a resolution.
body: This is redicilous, does somebody knows when is Teemo going to be available. He has been disabled for 2-3 days.  {{item:3070}} {{item:3070}} {{item:3070}}

replies.body:
No updates to share at the moment, unfortunately. You'll have to keep an eye on the Status Page you linked for further updates or confirmation the issue was fixed.

Let me know if you require assistance with anything else.
What exactly is the issue with him?

His camo happens a lot earlier when he goes in the bush, and if you time it right, you could recall while camoflaged.
That is the only bug I knew, but apparently he stealthed randomly while attacking as well.
I've played {{champion:17}}  ALOT and this never happened to me O-O;
No. BAD. Still better than a fizz main though.
